name: Don't run (VladimivrDBVY, igrok10)
description:
Mad Escape from UFOs

Control:
W\S - Acceleration\Deceleration
Mouse - for steering left\right
Shift - change view
Space - Nitro\Jump in fly

8 levels.
10 types of different transport.
Cutscenes at the beginning and end
Unique sounds and music
Everything is done by hand within the 2021 Epic MegaJam

Of the assets, only the asset was used - GOOD SKY
